content.webTitle: Snails have 14,000 teeth – does any animal have more?

fields.headline: Snails have 14,000 teeth – does any animal have more?
fields.bodyText: The average garden snail has around 14,000 teeth! Is there any animal with more? Who counts them? Ann Williams, Colne, Lancs Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
